name: Speedblock
description:
The fastest match-3 game with the simplest control!

Quit those boring ordinary match-3 games now, and meet Speedblock the super-blazing-lightning-fast match-3 game here!
How much would you score? Challenge your limit and compete your friends in Game Center!

* Familiar but absolutely unique gameplay!
* Most intense match-3 game in the world.
* Build your strategy to save the time.
* This game is completely free.
* No persistent internet connection is required.

* Tap and hold the game title for a few seconds and something special happens!
